rooms.description: Wide entrance with Vastu compliant directional placement ensuring auspicious entry.
Spacious living area with ample natural light and eco-friendly features such as large windows and solar panels integration.
Dining area integrated with living room for family interaction, featuring energy-efficient LED lighting and ventilation.
Compact eco-friendly kitchen designed with sustainable appliances and proper waste management systems in line with Vastu principles.
Private master bedroom with ample storage and natural light ensuring a peaceful sleep environment. Vastu guidelines ensure the headboard alignment.
Secondary bedroom with sufficient space for family members or guests. Vastu-compliant layout ensuring positive energy flow.
Functional bathroom with water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly design elements.
Dedicated home office with soundproofing and natural light exposure. Vastu alignment ensures productivity.
Private gym space featuring energy-efficient equipment and ample ventilation for a healthy workout environment.
Two-car garage integrated with the farmhouse structure for secure vehicle storage and additional workspace if needed.

openings.description: Main entrance door designed with Vastu principles for positive energy.
Large window to bring in natural light while ensuring privacy and energy efficiency.
Window for ventilation in the kitchen area.

notes: The farmhouse layout is designed to ensure seamless flow of natural energy (Vastu) and sustainable living practices.
All rooms are oriented with specific directions for maximum benefit, including the master bedroom in the north direction and kitchen away from the main entrance.
Energy-efficient systems such as solar panels, water-saving fixtures, and LED lighting have been incorporated.
